background_image_description: Full-canvas subtle grid pattern on light sage green (#dbe7cd) with thin, slightly darker green grid lines (#c7d6bb) forming even squares across the 1600x1600 canvas.

nodes.asset_description: Illustrated composition with transparent background: centered hand-drawn glass jar with dark green outline (#1f3f36) and light amber lid/top (#f2c56f). Inside the jar are four hearts—two warm red (#d74b43) and two mustard yellow (#f2b557)—with white highlights and a few dark green accent strokes. The jar sits on a muted sage oval shadow (#8fa791). Around the scene are two small white dash doodles to the left of the jar, a thin white heart outline in the upper-right area, and a large white rounded rectangle panel occupying the lower third of the canvas (with a curved notch around the jar’s shadow). On this white panel are stylized hand-drawn green numbers “1”, “2”, and “3” with white dot texture next to the corresponding paragraphs, plus a sage brush-stroke underline (#93b29a) beneath the right paragraph.

nodes.text: Write down your favorite self-care ideas on strips of paper.
Whenever you’re feeling down, stressed out, or drained – pull out a strip of paper and then do that activity.
